name: Fortress Data Vaulting
tag_list: online-backup, ontario-online-backup, remote-backup-ontario, london-ontario-backup, business-continuity, bcp, fortress-data-vaulting, fortress-backup, fortress-services, fortress-remote-backup
overview:
Fortress Data Vaulting specializes in business continuity services. We identify unforeseen risks and provide solutions that secure and protect a business in the event of an unexpected business interruption or shutdown. Fortress provides on site setup, 24/7 support, and cost effective solutions for an often overlooked critical necessity.

Fortress RBackup 2008 Consider for a moment what position you would be in if your customer database, email files, or any other business critical asset were to suddenly disappear or become corrupt? What if or your office was the victim of a business halting event or disaster? Viruses, hardware failure, human error, software corruption and sabotage are just a few of the risks. Statistics show that it’s not matter of “if” these will happen, rather “when.” Without a means of recovery the results can be catastrophic to you and your business. You can protect your critical assets and lay the groundwork to overcome any of these obstacles by incorporating the Fortress Remote Backup Service (RBS) into your corporate processes, policies and Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP).
